name: The Friends We Left Behind
description:
Play as a private investigator who is hired to explore an abandoned children's asylum, following the unsolved cases of missing persons in 1949. Nearly 30 years after its closing, you will discover secrets that have haunted the institution that housed tormented children long ago. In this puzzle-solving horror game, you must survive different "escape room" situations to win. Play 5 separate bone-chilling levels with unique gameplay featuring different Imaginary Friends.

Cinematic Cutscenes


Fully animated, detailed cutscenes for maximum interactive experience. Learn more about the enigmatic Imaginary Friends who haunt the abandoned asylum.

Five Levels, Five Difficulties


Play through five distinct levels with unique puzzle-solving gameplay. Challenge yourself with the difficulty option of your choosing. Escape the mysterious perpetrators who are after you.

Puzzle-Solving


Your puzzle-solving skills will be put to the test with each level. Figure out how to overcome the dangers of the asylum.

Story


Uncover pieces of lore about Hathmoore Children's Asylum, and the children it once hosted. Play through story mode's casual setting (all levels on the easiest difficulty) or hardcore setting (all levels on all difficulties).
